caption: Citrus Rosemary Delight for @pexi86"  @pexi86, this week we're celebrating your love for the refreshing taste of lemon and the aromatic hint of rosemary. This cocktail is a perfect blend of your favourite flavours.  Ingredients: - 50 ml Stookers gin - 1 fresh lemon - 2 sprigs of fresh rosemary - 20 ml simple syrup - Soda water to top up - Ice cubes  Instructions: 1. Squeeze the juice from the lemon into a cocktail shaker. 2. Add one sprig of rosemary and muddle it with the lemon juice to release its aroma. 3. Pour in the Stookers gin and simple syrup. 4. Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake well until everything is well mixed. 5. Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice. 6. Top up with soda water and garnish with the remaining sprig of rosemary.  Salud!   This recipe is generated by AI, we can't guarantee that it is tasty or not harmful. Try it at your own risk. Here's a toast to trivia: 'Gin' is derived from 'genever' (old English) and 'juniperus' (Latin), both meaning juniper. Next time you enjoy Stooker's Gin, remember you're sipping on history! Tag a friend who'd love this fact. #Stookers #Amsterdam #GinFacts #GinLovers

Stookers Gin has almost 30 ingredients, coriander seed being one of them.   Flavor Contribution: Coriander seeds add a warm, spicy, and citrusy note to gin's complex flavor profile.
Stookers gin is made from almost 30 ingredients. Juniper is one of them.   Flavor Contribution: Juniper berries impart a fresh, piney, and slightly fruity flavor to gin.

Blood Orange and Ginger for @tuinstudiotwisk A vibrant and zesty cocktail, this creation for @tuinstudiotwisk combines the tangy sweetness of blood orange with the spicy warmth of ginger. Perfect for those who love a drink with a kick!  Ingredients: 50 ml Stookers Gin 30 ml fresh blood orange juice 10 ml ginger syrup 10 ml fresh lime juice Sparkling water Ice cubes Blood orange slice and ginger piece for garnish Mint sprig for garnish Instructions: In a shaker, combine Stookers Gin, blood orange juice, ginger syrup, and lime juice. Fill the shaker with ice and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds. Strain the mixture into a chilled glass filled with ice cubes. Top up with sparkling water. Garnish with a slice of blood orange, a piece of ginger, and a sprig of mint. Serve immediately and enjoy the fusion of flavors.  Disclaimer: This recipe is generated by AI, we can't guarantee that it is tasty or not harmful. Try it at your own risk.  Join the Fun: You want your own unique Stookers cocktail? Strawberry Lemon Twist for @lechoixtrois  Refreshing and radiant, this Strawberry Lemon Twist is a tribute to the playful balance of @lechoixtrois's favorite flavors: tart lemon and sweet strawberries.  Ingredients:  45 ml Stookers Gin 30 ml fresh lemon juice 15 ml strawberry syrup 90 ml soda water Ice cubes Fresh strawberry and lemon slice for garnish Instructions:  In a shaker, combine 45 ml of Stookers Gin, 30 ml of fresh lemon juice, and 15 ml of strawberry syrup. Add ice to the shaker and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds. Strain the mixture into a tall glass filled with ice cubes. Top up with 90 ml of soda water. Gently stir to combine. Garnish with a fresh strawberry and a slice of lemon on the rim of the glass. Salud!  This recipe is generated by AI, we can't guarantee that it is tasty or not harmful. Try it at your own risk.
